alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 9:48PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mississippi, south central Pemiscot, north central Tipton and western Lauderdale Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 947 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fulton, or over Fort Pillow State Park, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Luxora, Fort Pillow State Park, Cooter, Fulton, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Barr, Barfield, O`Donnell Bend, Grider, Tomato, Rosa, Luckett, Burton, Keyes Port and Hickman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and west Tennessee.
